audio.audio_global_interpretation: Good vocal presence. Balanced and effective.
audio.speech_rate_interpretation: Slower than typical; very clear but may lack energy.
audio.speech_rate_coaching: Speed up slightly to keep the flow engaging, while keeping clarity.
audio.pause_ratio_coaching: Use silence to your advantage. Let your audience digest your ideas.
audio.pitch_dynamic_coaching: Tone it down slightly. Too much variation can sound insincere.
audio.volume_dynamic_coaching: Great dynamic range. You use volume effectively to convey emotion.
audio.vocal_punch_coaching: Soften your attack slightly. You don't need to shout to be heard.

body.body_global_interpretation: Good body language. Balanced and effective.
body.gesture_magnitude_interpretation: High gesture dynamics (Excellent). Confident, expansive gestures.
body.gesture_magnitude_coaching: Excellent use of space. Your gestures command attention.
body.gesture_activity_coaching: Move your hands to emphasize key verbs. You look frozen.
body.gesture_jitter_interpretation: Natural stability (Good). Healthy fluidity — no distracting instability.
body.gesture_jitter_coaching: Good control. Your hands look steady.
body.body_sway_coaching: Great stability. You look very grounded.
body.posture_openness_interpretation: Open, expansive posture (Excellent). Strong, confident posture.
body.posture_openness_coaching: Excellent command of space. You look authoritative.

face.face_global_interpretation: Needs improvement. Facial signals may be distracting or weak.
face.head_stability_coaching: Good control. A bit more movement could make you look warmer.
face.gaze_consistency_interpretation: Natural gaze behavior (Good). Natural eye contact.
face.gaze_consistency_coaching: Good eye contact. You feel present.
face.smile_activation_interpretation: Low smile activation (Weak). Professional but reserved.
face.smile_activation_coaching: Try to smile at the start and end of your sentences.
